text:
Hey everyone,
I lead the architecture and UX design for our product at <http://story.ai|story.ai>, and we’re developing a text-oriented low-code platform in alpha-testing. We have two customers we’ve built bespoke automations for using our editor and runtime.

*We would like to help you automate a task that is currently a pain in the butt that you might turn towards something like Zapier for.*

Perhaps your current choice of services have a limitation you can’t get around, and you think it would be possible to fix with a more flexible tool. *We are open to building exactly the integrations you need, even if they are a bit obscure*.

Any help in this regard would be invaluable to validate use-cases for our current product. :heart:

I’m open to answering questions, and if you’re interested in us building you something, DM me :slightly_smiling_face:

text: This post might also be appropriate for <#CCL5VVBAN|share-your-work> or <#CLYCGTCPL|of-end-user-programming>, but I figured this is the channel for dumping “everything else” including stuff like job postings.
